title: What can I do if the Y536A1 phone switch shortcuts are hidden?
answer:
Go to **Settings**, touch **Notification panel**, and select the **Notification settings** check box.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141023050421340001.png)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141023050421790002.png)

                                       The figures are for your
reference only. The actual screens may vary.
